level.heading: Rules.
level.text: Within 90 days after enactment of this subchapter, the Mayor shall issue rule to implement and enforce the provisions of this subchapter pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: Added by D.C. Law 12-14, § 9 (44 DCR 3620), eff. Sept. 5, 1997.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 540-1507.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-14, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1507.01.

level.heading: Resolutions
level.text: Resolution 16-352, the "International Registration Plan Enforcement Rulemaking Disapproval Resolution of 2005", was approved effective November 1, 2005.
